title: Can anyone identify the fonts used in this poster?
content:
Does anyone know what 2 fonts are used on this movie poster?

Thank you for your help!

-Taya

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Boys Dont cry.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503105544/http:/typophile.com/files/Boys%20Dont%20cry.jpg) | 49.41 KB |
author: gotaya

comments.content:
Most of the smaller lettering with the really short descenders looks like Anzeigen Grotesk (or Impact, Aura, or one of the Inserat faces). They are all quite similar.

- Mike Yanega
